steps.text: Welcome to the first tutorial! In this tutorial you will learn about the basics of the internet.
To get started, make sure you have Node.js and npm installed on your machine.
Run the following command to create a new Svelte project: `npx degit sveltejs/template svelte-tutorial`.
In Svelte, components are the building blocks of your application. Create a new component by adding a .svelte file.
Add your component's markup, script, and styles within the .svelte file.
